__header__.response: Recommended SanDisk Pro-G40 4TB (~$600, <2 ms latency, ~2800 MB/s read/~2400 MB/s write) to replace HDD (423 ms).

__header__.command: Assess SSD for Zephyr testbed and Obelisk Suite
__header__.response: SanDisk Pro-G40 meets LSU requirements (<3 ms, ~1000â€“2000 MB/s); T-FORCE SSD (~5000â€“7400 MB/s, <0.5 ms) supports OGF UI rendering.

__header__.command: Plan Zephyr testbed donation for gaming with LSU caching
__header__.response: Suitable for War Thunder, For Honor (1080p/60â€“120 FPS). Migrate F:\OBELISK-OS to T-FORCE SSD, add monitor (~$250), accessories (~$150). Develop lsu_cache.ps1 for ~2â€“5s load times.

__header__.command: Confirm RTX 4060 for gaming and OGF support
__header__.response: RTX 4060 supports 1080p/60â€“120 FPS and OGF rendering (ogf_chat_ui.html). Proceed with SSD upgrade.
Focus on OGF (ogf_chat_ui.html testing), GlyphEngine (glyph_codex_init.ps1 debugging), xAI API (connect_grok.ps1), LSU caching (lsu_cache.ps1).
